Ashton Cox Serie A

Aaron Ramsey Leaves Mexico and Returns to England After Dog Goes Missing

Aaron Ramsey has mutually agreed to terminate his contract at Pumas UNAM and return to England, after his dog Halo went missing.

The beagle vanished from a day care dog centre in the San Miguel de Allende region of the Guanajuato municipality - which is 240 kilometres from where UNAM play - three weeks ago.

The former Arsenal and Juventus midfielder initially offered...
